name: Cryo-Rover
description:
Your a little rover stranded on an alien planet. Advanced alien creatures are harassing you. Luckily, your equipped with a state-of-the-art CRYOCANNON.

Controls:

Left Click = Shoot CRYOCANNON

Right Click = Create Ice Wall

WASD = Move

Mouse = Aim

Spacebar = Boost

I'm still putting some finishing touches, like music, on this game. So there will be a few small updates in the near future.

ENJOY!
